title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 525.1 - Declaration of policy and regulatory intent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 525.1 - Declaration of policy and regulatory intent

State Regulations

The Office of Victim Services recognizes that the statutory
provisions enumerated in article 22 of the Executive Law may not fully describe
the services provided to claimants or the processes followed by the office
during the claim process and thereafter. Pursuant to subdivision 3 of section
623
of the Executive Law, the office adopts
this Part in order to implement the provisions and purposes of article 22 and
to describe the services provided to claimants and the processes followed by
the office during the claim process and thereafter. This Part is meant to
supplement the information provided by the provisions of article 22 of the

Executive Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
525.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
